messages.subject: eating at the computer
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well sure.  I think the most difficult food is hot chicken wings, with all that eat, wipe, drink, type going on. Mary J [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
> Ah ha! Finally someone who, like me, eats in front of the computer, often
> while reading here!
> I've been known to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner while reading at the
> computer depending on if I'm eating alone and if my dh is home, in which
> case I defnitely eat with him.
> Anyone else do this?
>

Well sure. I think the most difficult food is hot chicken wings, with all
that eat, wipe, drink, type going on.
Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
